attributes.action: I will suicide If you ignore me and you will be responsible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

 Unfortunately I am pakistani.  Due to some crises and teririsom in Pakistan, I want to leave Pakistan and want to settled in UK as British Citizen and serve my services for UK.  

I passed my Bachelor in Commerce in 2007 but still I am jobless.  Now I am currently enrolled in MBA but I hope that I will be jobless after MBA.  Kindly allow me visa for UK to serve my service for UK.

Uk is also a part of this world and as a human I have right to live any where I can get peace and work.

Regards

Noman Ahmad
+923456007600
nomi.sargodha@gmail.com

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
